transArray.content: The hotel environment is good. As soon as you enter the door, the front desk specialist will take your temperature and carefully provide detailed information for guests coming to Beijing. They are very responsible to our guests during the epidemic. The room is quite comfortable. The aunties in the guest room clean it very well. There is also a self-service laundry room on the first floor, which is also very convenient. Clothes are washed and dried in minutes. It is recommended to stay here.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. It is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. You can shop and eat there, and there are free facilities. Parking lot and laundry room. I hope this hotel can become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your visit again!
